Description: Small irregular textile fragment of medium-coarse quality linen cloth. Loose weave, with a high proportion of warp threads. Undyded linen, or coloured with a yellow pigment (now buff to tan in colour). Edges torn or ragged. Stained. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.22 ends per 10mm and weft c.7 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Possibly the same cloth as BM 6556, 6558 and 6559b. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
